QuestData.Title: The Diamond King
QuestData.Description: Me brother Magni, once King o' Ironforge, got changed into a diamond statue by a titan ritual. He's stood frozen in the belly o' the city fer years.$b$bBut I just got word that he's up and around... sayin' he knows somethin' 'bout how to beat the Legion!$b$bLook, $n, I dunno if Magni's crazy, or if that's even really him. But if there's even a chance he kin help us...$b$bI'm told he muttered the name Ulduar. That's where I'm headed! I'd be obliged if you an' Khadgar were ta join me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Go with Brann and Khadgar to Ulduar and hear Magni Bronzebeard's message.
QuestData.RewardText: Magni's information was crucial to our efforts against the Legion. And it was good to see him again.$b$bNow to find that tome about the Pillars of Creation...

Objectives.Objective: Tell Brann It's Time to Go
